00091     template <class T>
00092     class ParamDescription : public AbstractParamDescription
00093     {
00094     public:
00095       ParamDescription(std::string name, std::string type, uint32_t level, 
00096           std::string description, std::string edit_method, T EposManagerConfig::* f) :
00097         AbstractParamDescription(name, type, level, description, edit_method),
00098         field(f)
00099       {}
00100 
00101       T (EposManagerConfig::* field);
00102 
00103       virtual void clamp(EposManagerConfig &config, const EposManagerConfig &max, const EposManagerConfig &min) const
00104       {
00105         if (config.*field > max.*field)
00106           config.*field = max.*field;
00107         
00108         if (config.*field < min.*field)
00109           config.*field = min.*field;
00110       }
00111 
00112       virtual void calcLevel(uint32_t &comb_level, const EposManagerConfig &config1, const EposManagerConfig &config2) const
00113       {
00114         if (config1.*field != config2.*field)
00115           comb_level |= level;
00116       }
00117 
00118       virtual void fromServer(const ros::NodeHandle &nh, EposManagerConfig &config) const
00119       {
00120         nh.getParam(name, config.*field);
00121       }
00122 
00123       virtual void toServer(const ros::NodeHandle &nh, const EposManagerConfig &config) const
00124       {
00125         nh.setParam(name, config.*field);
00126       }
00127 
00128       virtual bool fromMessage(const dynamic_reconfigure::Config &msg, EposManagerConfig &config) const
00129       {
00130         return dynamic_reconfigure::ConfigTools::getParameter(msg, name, config.*field);
00131       }
00132 
00133       virtual void toMessage(dynamic_reconfigure::Config &msg, const EposManagerConfig &config) const
00134       {
00135         dynamic_reconfigure::ConfigTools::appendParameter(msg, name, config.*field);
00136       }
00137 
00138       virtual void getValue(const EposManagerConfig &config, boost::any &val) const
00139       {
00140         val = config.*field;
00141       }

00165       void convertParams()
00166       {
00167         for(std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = abstract_parameters.begin(); i != abstract_parameters.end(); i++)
00168         {
00169           parameters.push_back(dynamic_reconfigure::ParamDescription(**i));
00170         }

00177     template<class T, class PT>
00178     class GroupDescription : public AbstractGroupDescription
00179     {
00180     public:
00181       GroupDescription(std::string name, std::string type, int parent, int id, bool s, T PT::* f) : AbstractGroupDescription(name, type, parent, id, s), field(f)
00182       {
00183       }
00184 
00185       GroupDescription(const GroupDescription<T, PT>& g): AbstractGroupDescription(g.name, g.type, g.parent, g.id, g.state), field(g.field), groups(g.groups)
00186       {
00187         parameters = g.parameters;
00188         abstract_parameters = g.abstract_parameters;
00189       }
00190 
00191       virtual bool fromMessage(const dynamic_reconfigure::Config &msg, boost::any &cfg) const
00192       {
00193         PT* config = boost::any_cast<PT*>(cfg);
00194         if(!dynamic_reconfigure::ConfigTools::getGroupState(msg, name, (*config).*field))
00195           return false;
00196         
00197         for(std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = groups.begin(); i != groups.end(); i++) 
00198         {
00199           boost::any n = &((*config).*field);
00200           if(!(*i)->fromMessage(msg, n))
00201             return false;
00202         }
00203 
00204         return true;
00205       }
00206 
00207       virtual void setInitialState(boost::any &cfg) const
00208       {
00209         PT* config = boost::any_cast<PT*>(cfg);
00210         T* group = &((*config).*field);
00211         group->state = state;
00212 
00213         for(std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = groups.begin(); i != groups.end(); i++)
00214         {
00215           boost::any n = boost::any(&((*config).*field));
00216           (*i)->setInitialState(n);
00217         }
00218 
00219       }
00220       
00221       virtual void updateParams(boost::any &cfg, EposManagerConfig &top) const
00222       {
00223         PT* config = boost::any_cast<PT*>(cfg);
00224 
00225         T* f = &((*config).*field);
00226         f->setParams(top, abstract_parameters);
00227 
00228         for(std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = groups.begin(); i != groups.end(); i++) 
00229         {
00230           boost::any n = &((*config).*field);
00231           (*i)->updateParams(n, top);
00232         }
00233       }
00234 
00235       virtual void toMessage(dynamic_reconfigure::Config &msg, const boost::any &cfg) const
00236       {
00237         const PT config = boost::any_cast<PT>(cfg);
00238         dynamic_reconfigure::ConfigTools::appendGroup<T>(msg, name, id, parent, config.*field);
00239 
00240         for(std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = groups.begin(); i != groups.end(); i++)
00241         {
00242           (*i)->toMessage(msg, config.*field);
00243         }
00244       }
00245 
00246       T (PT::* field);
00247       std::vector<EposManagerConfig::AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr> groups;

00259     void setParams(EposManagerConfig &config, const std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr> params)
00260     {
00261       for (std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = params.begin(); i != params.end(); i++)
00262       {
00263         boost::any val;
00264         (*i)->getValue(config, val);
00265 
00266         if("Position_Profile_Velocity"==(*i)->name){Position_Profile_Velocity = boost::any_cast<int>(val);}
00267         if("Position_Profile_Acceleration"==(*i)->name){Position_Profile_Acceleration = boost::any_cast<int>(val);}
00268         if("Position_Profile_Deceleration"==(*i)->name){Position_Profile_Deceleration = boost::any_cast<int>(val);}
00269         if("Velocity_Profile_Acceleration"==(*i)->name){Velocity_Profile_Acceleration = boost::any_cast<int>(val);}
00270         if("Velocity_Profile_Deceleration"==(*i)->name){Velocity_Profile_Deceleration = boost::any_cast<int>(val);}
00271         if("Disable_Motor"==(*i)->name){Disable_Motor = boost::any_cast<bool>(val);}
00272         if("Reinitialize_Motor"==(*i)->name){Reinitialize_Motor = boost::any_cast<bool>(val);}
00273       }
00274     }

00308     bool __fromMessage__(dynamic_reconfigure::Config &msg)
00309     {
00310       const std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr> &__param_descriptions__ = __getParamDescriptions__();
00311       const std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr> &__group_descriptions__ = __getGroupDescriptions__();
00312 
00313       int count = 0;
00314       for (std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = __param_descriptions__.begin(); i != __param_descriptions__.end(); i++)
00315         if ((*i)->fromMessage(msg, *this))
00316           count++;
00317 
00318       for (std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = __group_descriptions__.begin(); i != __group_descriptions__.end(); i ++)
00319       {
00320         if ((*i)->id == 0)
00321         {
00322           boost::any n = boost::any(this);
00323           (*i)->updateParams(n, *this);
00324           (*i)->fromMessage(msg, n);
00325         }
00326       }
00327 
00328       if (count != dynamic_reconfigure::ConfigTools::size(msg))
00329       {
00330         ROS_ERROR("EposManagerConfig::__fromMessage__ called with an unexpected parameter.");
00331         ROS_ERROR("Booleans:");
00332         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < msg.bools.size(); i++)
00333           ROS_ERROR("  %s", msg.bools[i].name.c_str());
00334         ROS_ERROR("Integers:");
00335         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < msg.ints.size(); i++)
00336           ROS_ERROR("  %s", msg.ints[i].name.c_str());
00337         ROS_ERROR("Doubles:");
00338         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < msg.doubles.size(); i++)
00339           ROS_ERROR("  %s", msg.doubles[i].name.c_str());
00340         ROS_ERROR("Strings:");
00341         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < msg.strs.size(); i++)
00342           ROS_ERROR("  %s", msg.strs[i].name.c_str());
00343         // @todo Check that there are no duplicates. Make this error more
00344         // explicit.
00345         return false;
00346       }
00347       return true;
00348     }
00349 
00350     // This version of __toMessage__ is used during initialization of
00351     // statics when __getParamDescriptions__ can't be called yet.
00352     void __toMessage__(dynamic_reconfigure::Config &msg, const std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr> &__param_descriptions__, const std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr> &__group_descriptions__) const
00353     {
00354       dynamic_reconfigure::ConfigTools::clear(msg);
00355       for (std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = __param_descriptions__.begin(); i != __param_descriptions__.end(); i++)
00356         (*i)->toMessage(msg, *this);
00357 
00358       for (std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = __group_descriptions__.begin(); i != __group_descriptions__.end(); i++)
00359       {
00360         if((*i)->id == 0)
00361         {
00362           (*i)->toMessage(msg, *this);
00363         }
00364       }
00365     }
00366     
00367     void __toMessage__(dynamic_reconfigure::Config &msg) const
00368     {
00369       const std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr> &__param_descriptions__ = __getParamDescriptions__();
00370       const std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr> &__group_descriptions__ = __getGroupDescriptions__();
00371       __toMessage__(msg, __param_descriptions__, __group_descriptions__);
00372     }
00373     
00374     void __toServer__(const ros::NodeHandle &nh) const
00375     {
00376       const std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr> &__param_descriptions__ = __getParamDescriptions__();
00377       for (std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = __param_descriptions__.begin(); i != __param_descriptions__.end(); i++)
00378         (*i)->toServer(nh, *this);
00379     }
00380 
00381     void __fromServer__(const ros::NodeHandle &nh)
00382     {
00383       static bool setup=false;
00384 
00385       const std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr> &__param_descriptions__ = __getParamDescriptions__();
00386       for (std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = __param_descriptions__.begin(); i != __param_descriptions__.end(); i++)
00387         (*i)->fromServer(nh, *this);
00388 
00389       const std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr> &__group_descriptions__ = __getGroupDescriptions__();
00390       for (std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = __group_descriptions__.begin(); i != __group_descriptions__.end(); i++){
00391         if (!setup && (*i)->id == 0) {
00392           setup = true;
00393           boost::any n = boost::any(this);
00394           (*i)->setInitialState(n);
00395         }
00396       }
00397     }

00399     void __clamp__()
00400     {
00401       const std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr> &__param_descriptions__ = __getParamDescriptions__();
00402       const EposManagerConfig &__max__ = __getMax__();
00403       const EposManagerConfig &__min__ = __getMin__();
00404       for (std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = __param_descriptions__.begin(); i != __param_descriptions__.end(); i++)
00405         (*i)->clamp(*this, __max__, __min__);
00406     }
00407 
00408     uint32_t __level__(const EposManagerConfig &config) const
00409     {
00410       const std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr> &__param_descriptions__ = __getParamDescriptions__();
00411       uint32_t level = 0;
00412       for (std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = __param_descriptions__.begin(); i != __param_descriptions__.end(); i++)
00413         (*i)->calcLevel(level, config, *this);
00414       return level;
00415     }

00532     static const EposManagerConfigStatics *get_instance()
00533     {
00534       // Split this off in a separate function because I know that
00535       // instance will get initialized the first time get_instance is
00536       // called, and I am guaranteeing that get_instance gets called at
00537       // most once.
00538       static EposManagerConfigStatics instance;
00539       return &instance;
00540     }
00541   };

00573   inline const EposManagerConfigStatics *EposManagerConfig::__get_statics__()
00574   {
00575     const static EposManagerConfigStatics *statics;
00576   
00577     if (statics) // Common case
00578       return statics;
00579 
00580     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(dynamic_reconfigure::__init_mutex__);
00581 
00582     if (statics) // In case we lost a race.
00583       return statics;
00584 
00585     statics = EposManagerConfigStatics::get_instance();
00586     
00587     return statics;
00588   }
